messages.content: [{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"CAKE includes a restaurant in comps beginning in its 19th month of operation."},{"criteria":"North Italia restaurants open at Q2 FY2025 end-of-period: 46","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"North Italia openings Q1 FY2024: 2","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"North Italia openings Q2 FY2024: 1","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"North Italia openings Q3 FY2024: 0"},{"criteria":"North Italia openings Q4 FY2024: 3","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"North Italia openings Q1 FY2025: 3"},{"criteria":"North Italia openings Q2 FY2025: 1","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Total North Italia openings over the last six quarters: 10"},{"criteria":"Compute Q2 FY2025 EOP comparable restaurants for North Italia as Q2 FY2025 EOP Open restaurants - Cumulative openings over the last 6 quarters","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Q2 FY2025 end-of-period comparable North Italia restaurants: 36","operator":"correctness"}]
